Description: ğŸ’¡Battle for light: 209 DTEK energy workers were honored with state awards in 2024. Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ•¯ï¸A DTEK energy engineer was killed during a massive attack T...
Description: ğŸ•¯ï¸A DTEK power engineer was killed during a massive attack. Today, the Russian occupiers killed our colleague Dmytro Petlenko, an engineer who worked at one of the thermal power plants. After carrying out search operations, he was found under the rubble without signs of life. Dmitry was 51 years old. He devoted more than 30 years to the profession of energy. He worked for a long time at the Zaporizhzhia TPP. After the occupation of Energodaru, he got a job at another thermal power plant of the company, where he continued the battle for light for the last year and a half. A great loss for the family of Ukrainian energy workers. We express our deepest condolences to everyone who knew and loved Dmytro. We will never forget. We will never forgive the Russian invaders.

Title: ğŸ”ğŸ–¼ Every Russian massive strike requires time to prepare. It ne...
Description: Forwarded From Zelenskiy / OfficialEvery massive Russian strike requires time to prepare. It is never a spontaneous decision. This is a conscious choice not only of goals, but also of time and date. Today, Putin deliberately chose Christmas to attack. What could be more inhuman? More than 70 missiles, including ballistic ones, and more than a hundred attack drones. Goals are our energy. They continue to fight for a blackout in Ukraine. According to preliminary data, our defenders managed to shoot down more than 50 missiles and a significant part of drones. Unfortunately, there is a hit. As of now, there are outages in several regions. Power engineers are working to restore light as soon as possible. Thank you to everyone who is currently working for the country, who is on combat duty, who protects our sky. Let's restore the maximum. Russian evil will not break Ukraine or distort Christmas.

Title: ğŸ–¼ â€¼ï¸Russia struck the DTEK thermal power plants: the equipment w...
Description: â€¼ï¸Russia struck the DTEK thermal power plants: the equipment was seriously damaged. Today, the Russian Federation carried out another massive terrorist attack on the energy infrastructure of Ukraine. The DTEK thermal power plant was attacked. As a result of the massive attack, the equipment of the TPP was seriously damaged. After the end of the shelling, the energy companies quickly started to eliminate their consequences and restore the operation of the equipment. This year, this is already the thirteenth mass attack on the Ukrainian energy industry and the tenth mass attack on the company's energy enterprises. In total, since the beginning of the full-scale invasion, the DTEK thermal power plant has been fired upon more than 200 times

Title: â€¼ï¸Attention: power outage schedules for December 25 In connection...
Description: â€¼ï¸Attention: power outage schedules for December 25. In connection with the large-scale missile attack, Ukrenergo has provided commands to implement power outage schedules. Important: Ukrenergo teams may change during the day. Follow the updates on our Telegram channel! âº Kyiv Queues 1.1, 1.2, 2.1, 2.2, 3.1, 3.2: the light will be out until 09:30. âº Dnipropetrovsk Queues 1.1, 1.2: the light will be out until 08:30, from 12:00 to 3:30 p.m. and from 10:30 p.m. to 24:00. Queues 2.1, 2.2: light will be absent from 12:00 to 19:00 and from 22:30 to 24:00. Queues 3.1, 3.2: light will be absent until 12:00 and from 15:30 to 22:00 30. Queues 4.1, 4.2: the light will be absent until 12:00 and from 15:30 to 19:00. Queues 5.1, 5.2: the light will be absent until 12:00 and from 19:00 to 24:00. Queues 6.1, 6.2: the light will be absent from 12:00 to 15:30 and from 19:00 to 22:30. âº Odeshchyna Queues 1.1, 1.2, 2.1, 2.2: the light will be on no light until 10:00. Lines 3.1, 3.2: lights will be off from 10:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m. Lines 4.1, 4.2: lights will be off until 10:00. Lines 5.1, 5.2, 6.1, 6.2: lights will be off from 10 :00 to 13:00. âº Kyiv region Queues 1.1, 1.2, 2.1, 2.2: no light until 09:00. Lines 3.1, 3.2: no light until 10:30. Lines 4.1, 4.2: no light until 09:00. Lines 5.1, 5.2, 6.1, 6.2 : light will be absent until 10:30.â€¼ï¸Subscribe and share with relatives and friends.

Title: ğŸ–¼ Christ was born! Let's praise Him! Merry Christmas to all of u...

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ’¡ For the first time, unique features were shown on the body ...
Description: ğŸ’¡ On the hull of the destroyed Orest transformer, for the first time, unique footage from the Kurakhiv TPP, for which fierce battles are currently ongoing, was shown. A symbolic event took place in Kyiv on Energy Day. Transformer Orest became the first movie screen on which excerpts of the documentary The Last Prometheus of Donbas were presented. The tape tells about the work of the Kurakhiv thermal power station near the front line. The film crew lived together with the energy workers at the power plant and came under constant fire. The TPP worked until the end, but after critical destruction, it was forced to stop. But the mission of the energy workers did not stop there - they continued the battle for light at other thermal power plants. The documentary will be released in 2025. Director: Anton Shtuka.

Title: ğŸ¬ Today is Energy Day. Day of victory of light over darkness. A ...
Description: Today is Energy Day. The day of the victory of light over darkness. The day of hard round-the-clock work despite fatigue. You only have to look up. Catch the signal. Turn off the generator, extinguish the candles. Catch yourself thinking - How little is needed for happiness - and realize that this - little - is given with great effort. We thank the Defense Forces, thanks to which the energy industry is able to work. We thank all Ukrainian companies that stick together and continue their work in the face of extremely difficult challenges. Happy holidays. The battle for light continues! Video is too big

Title: ğŸ”ğŸ¬ On the eve of the Energy Day, he met with our employees of t...
Description: Forwarded From Zelenskiy / OfficialOn the eve of the Energy Day, he met with our workers in the energy sector and honored them with state awards. For the third year already, our energy sector is a target for Russia, and this enemy is always looking for the most vile options for strikes. Each time, missile and drone strikes are calculated to cause maximum damage to our generation and networks. And every time our people do their best to provide electricity to cities and villages as soon as possible. We thank everyone who works for light for Ukrainians, for heat in our apartments and houses. ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Video is too big

Title: ğŸ–¼ â€¼ï¸Russia delivered a massive blow to DTEK thermal power plants...
Description: â€¼ï¸Russia launched a massive attack on DTEK thermal power plants: equipment was damaged Today, December 13, Russia carried out another massive terrorist attack on the energy infrastructure of Ukraine. DTEK thermal power plants were attacked. According to preliminary information, there were no casualties. As a result of the massive attack, the equipment of the TPP was seriously damaged. After the end of the shelling, the energy companies quickly started to eliminate their consequences and restore the operation of the equipment. This year, this is already the twelfth mass attack on the Ukrainian energy industry and the ninth mass attack on the company's energy enterprises. In total, since the beginning of the full-scale invasion, the DTEK thermal power plant has been fired upon more than 200 times

Description: âš™ï¸ Since the beginning of the year, DTEK has invested UAH 2.8 billion in the restoration of damaged TPPs. This year, the enemy has already carried out 11 massive attacks on the Ukrainian energy system. However, energy workers work around the clock to eliminate the consequences of shelling as soon as possible. - In November, Russia used more than 400 missiles and drones against energy facilities in Ukraine. Our thermal power plants were also affected again. But energy workers are doing their best. The work continues non-stop, - said the general director of DTEK Energo Oleksandr Fomenko. During the full-scale invasion, Russia shelled the DTEK TPP more than 200 times. The battle for light continues! ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦
